device1.tooltip: Pick a device from your system (list is populated dynamically)

device1-nickname.tooltip: Custom friendly name like 'Speakers' or 'Monitor'. Leave empty to use device name.

device2.tooltip: Pick a device from your system (list is populated dynamically)

device2-nickname.tooltip: Custom friendly name like 'Headset' or 'USB Speakers'. Leave empty to use device name.

test-sound-button.tooltip: Play a test sound to verify the current audio device

toggle-keybinding.tooltip: Set a global keyboard shortcut to switch audio devices. Leave empty to disable.

show-notifications.tooltip: Display a notification popup when audio device is changed

remember-volume.tooltip: Automatically restore volume when switching to a device

device1-icon.description: Icon for Device 1 (shown when Device 1 is active)
device1-icon.tooltip: Choose an icon name or image file

device2-icon.description: Icon for Device 2 (shown when Device 2 is active)
device2-icon.tooltip: Choose an icon name or image file
